name: Star Fighter: D'Yammens's Reign
overview: Amiga Space Flight Shooter, Star Fighter by GeoSync media 1999. This is a space shooter for the lower spec Amigas that cant run Freespace. A game in the style of WingCommander. There are plenty of missions which can be attempted as the good guys, the bad guys or a rogue trader, who is only in it to make money. There are some fairly impressive cutscenes and an impressive music score. 100 years in the future and mankind is on the brink of destruction. You can make a difference!
